Description: AWS Cloud Formation Template for deployment of Informatica Powercenter Version 10.1.1 on a VPC infrastructure. Informatica PowerCenter is deployed on RHEL 7.0. Amazon RDS instance in a private subnet is used as the repository for Informatica Domain Metadata. **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 instance and related resources. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.

AvailabilityZones.Description: List of Availability Zones to use for the subnets in the VPC. Note: The logical order is preserved and only 2 AZs are used for this deployment

DatabasePassword.Description: Password for the Amazon RDS database account

DatabasePasswordConfirm.Description: Password for the Amazon RDS database account

DatabaseType.Description: The type of database to use in Amazon RDS. Currently, you can only use Oracle

DatabaseUsername.Description: Username for the Amazon RDS database account

EncryptionKeyPhrase.ConstraintDescription: It should be 8 to 20 characters long, at least one uppercase letter at least one lowercase letter-at least one number Does not contain spaces
EncryptionKeyPhrase.Description: The text string used as the base word from which to generate an encryption key for the Informatica domain

InformaticaNodeName.Description: Prefix for the Nodes in Informatica Domain. Node number will be the suffix for the nodes. Eg InfaNode1, InfaNode2

PowerCenterInstanceType.Description: Instance Type for Informatica Domain. Default is c4.2xlarge

KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable external access to the Informatica Domain

NumberOfPowerCenterInstances.Description: Number of PowerCenter Nodes. Each node runs on one EC2 Instance

PrivateSubnet1CIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR block for private subnet 1 located in Availability Zone 1

PrivateSubnet2CIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR block for private subnet 2 located in Availability Zone 2

PublicSubnet1CIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PublicSubnet1CIDR.Description: CIDR Block for the public subnet 1 located in Availability Zone 1

PublicSubnet2CIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PublicSubnet2CIDR.Description: CIDR Block for the public subnet 2 located in Availability Zone 2

RemoteAccessCIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/x
RemoteAccessCIDR.Description: Allowed CIDR block for external access to the Informatica Domain

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28

LicenseKey.Description: *Optional Argument*. Provide a PUBLIC S3 link for the License Key file. Leave blank to go ahead without the Licence Key

CreateEFS.Description: Create shared storage for High Availability. Default value is Yes. Shared storage is created only if it is available in your region

EnableEIP.Description: Assign Elastic IPs to Instances. Default value is Yes

Assertions.AssertDescription: Informatica Domain Passwords do not match

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet Group for Informatica PowerCenter RDS Database

Properties.GroupDescription: Informatica PowerCenter RDS Database Security Group
Enable RDP and within VPC traffic

PowerCenterAgentIP.Description: Elastic IP address of the PowerCenter instance

InstanceID.Description: Instance ID of the newly created EC2 Master instance

AvailabilityZone.Description: Availability Zone of the newly created EC2 instances

PublicDNS.Description: Public DNS name of the newly created EC2 Master instance
